CreateNewFile.description:
Create a new file pointed by $path and inserting the $header to it.

$path [str] : Fullpath of file
$header [list] : File header

AppendFile.description:
Append data to existing file pointed by $path.

$path [str] : Fullpath of file
$header [list] : File header

 If the file does not exist create a new one and instert $header to it If the file already exist the header won't be inserted.

ReadFile.desciption:
Open a file for read

 $path : Fullpath of a file
